sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-col sm="3" cols="12">
        <b-input-group size="sm">
            <input v-model="titleBoard" v-on:keyup.enter="addBoard" placeholder="Add Board..." class="form-control">
            <b-input-group-append>
            <b-button variant="info" @click="addBoard">ok</b-button>
            </b-input-group-append>
        </b-input-group>
    </b-col>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'addBoardForm',
  propos: {
      boards: Array,
      titleBoard: String
  },
  methods: {
    addBoard() {
      if(this.titleBoard == ''){
        return alert('Board Title is required')
      }
      this.boards.push({
        title: this.titleBoard,
        items: [],
        showAddCard: false
      })
      this.titleBoard = ''
      this.showAddBoard = false
    }
  }
}
</script>
